action.content:
Size her biri 5'e 5 boyutunda olan üç matris veriliyor.
Matrislerde "▢" ile işaretlenmiş boş hücreler ve "X" ile işaretlenmiş dolu hücreler vardır.
Göreviniz, hedef matrisi diğer iki çeldirici matristen ayıran ve onu en iyi şekilde tanımlayan bir referans ifadesi oluşturmaktır.
İlk matris hedef matristir ve sonraki iki matris çeldiricilerdir.

Hedef matris:

X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

Çeldirici matris 1:

X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

Çeldirici matris 2:

X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

Talimat: Hedef matrisi tanımlayın.
"İfade: " etiketi ile başlayan referans ifadesini oluşturun. Diğer metinleri atlayın.

"Expression: The target matrix is characterized by having 'X' marks in the first and last columns, as well as in the third row. It is distinct from the first clutter matrix by having empty cells ('▢') in the second and fourth columns of the third row, and from the second clutter matrix by having empty cells in the second and fourth columns of the fourth row."

action.original_content: "Expression: The target matrix is characterized by having 'X' marks in the first and last columns, as well as in the third row. It is distinct from the first clutter matrix by having empty cells ('▢') in the second and fourth columns of the third row, and from the second clutter matrix by having empty cells in the second and fourth columns of the fourth row."
